PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(O2) - 商务英语词汇 ... oxalis 醋浆草 oxcart 牛车 Oxford accent 装腔作势的口音.

list.abs: from Shaoshan , it was two days' journey by oxcart along a rutted earthen track , althouth porters could do it in one , carrying80 kilograms of merchandise on their backs .从韶山到湘潭，沿着那条车马辗成的泥土路，乘牛车要两天时间，尽管搬运工人能背上80公斤的商品，以步代车地走到县城。
the ox drags the oxcart .牛拉车.

entry.def: An oxcart is a cart pulled by an ox or oxen.

means.word_mean: 1. a cart that is drawn by an ox

auth_sentence.content: Meanwhile, no runaway oxcart smears us into the road.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Meanwhile, no runaway oxcart smears us into the road.

auth_sentence.content: The latter were Eastern white pine, hand-cut in Maine and hauled south by oxcart.
